website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses its competitors with high-end appearance, quality build, and timeless style. A solid choice for your home.
pros: A striking wood table with a solid metal frame
Distressed finish creates a rustic feel
cons: Some owners say it has a strange odor upon arrival

website_summaries.verdict: The open shelf table of choice for people pushing the limits of the mid-century style or wanting to mix mid-century with a more rustic approach.
pros: Rustic accents of the table are great for mid century and industrial design decor styles
Solid feeling construction around the legs

website_summaries.verdict: The Industrial steel frame with rustic distressed-effect hardwood top creates a stylish centerpiece for any living room.
pros: We love the rich wood color and dark steel frame, which complement each other well
Users report that it's easy to assemble
cons: There may be a chemical smell from the lacquer, but it will fade over time

customer_reviews.title: I dig it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to act like I'm good with interior decorating, but it has a rustic and modern feel in my opinion. Quite sturdy too. Description photos are accurate. Another plus is that it was delivered almost a week earlier than it was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Great table - INSTALL ADVICE
customer_reviews.text: I like the table a lot... just be aware you'll need coasters because the top isn't perfectly flat as it has the character of real wood. Install - hopefully you have a better Allan wrench like one I attached that has chuck and socket capabilities. Attach the bottom shelf first to the legs first ... fasten one side completely, leave the other loose. Flip the top upside down. You'll put the tight side in its slot first then apply pressure to the other legs to pull them into place as well. If you tighten the shelf completely, you won't have enough play in the legs to pull them into their slots. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid table.
customer_reviews.text: This was a solid table that worked really well for my needs. I put it together by myself (used stacks of books to get the lower shelf in place and screwed in). It seems sturdy, and it really brings my room together. I like the rustic touch it brings.
customer_reviews.author: tnnantzinga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and stylish. Wood is heavy and unique. Very easy to put together. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe what you get for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table!!!! Came packaged nicely and was very easy to put together. I am very impressed with the quality and just how sturdy it is for the price. We just moved into a new house and am going with the farmhouse look and it's just perfect. I highly recommend this table and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sturdy, nice rustic look. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with someones fingernail lacquered onto it... Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: So my table came with the added bonus of someones finger nail firmly attached to the table under a generous clear coat or something. It's gross, and I can't remove it without scratching the crap out of the table
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. My husband did too- it's a good size and feels and looks more expensive that it is. Great for Rustin, farmhouse or industrial style decor. easy to put together. Heavy.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoSun

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was made in the USA.. ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was made in the USA..says made in China. Is this even wood? Was so looking forward to this after reading reviews. Didn't think buying used would be a big deal....wrong!!! Came missing tools and screws and the bottom posts that hold bottom shelf are bent. This table wobbles and now I have to go out and buy more screws. Does anyone even check everything before they send it out? I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Product defective! Lazy Manufacturing!
customer_reviews.text: Table looks great. However it seems like a common problem is the issue of assembling it. People are complaining that the "holes" don't line up. At first I thought it was because the brackets were bent. The manufacture is welding the brackets on BACKWARDS! You can see from my first picture the bracket is welded wrong, making it impossible to assemble. Took pictures of it against the wood as well to clearly show it's backwards. Very disappointed, because this is just lazines/poor product control by the manufacture. I understand that workers can make mistakes but this should have never made it off the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the Price ~ A really nice table.
customer_reviews.text: I received my coffee table today. It was very easy to put together. It said it was a two person job but I did it alone with no issues. I did have to get creative with holding the bottom shelf up while I attached it, but that was really a non-issue. It is high quality for the price and looks really beautiful. I was disappointed when I went back to purchase the end table and it was more expensive than the coffee table. Go figure. I suppose I won't buy the end table. Anyway ..... I'm extremely happy with the coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this table! Was the perfect choice for the room, I also bought the matching end table. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: WHat a great piece of work
customer_reviews.text: WHat a great piece of work! It is quite sturdy and easy to assemble although you have to follow recommendations and put ALL screws in place before tightening them. Some of the screws that are pre-assembled on the tableboard are loose and you have to use screwdriver to fix them. Also there are small holes here and there on the wood but it doesn't bother me so much and doesn't lower overall appearance of the product. The table is manufactured in China but I didn't expect it to be from USA for such a low price
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: To the horror of my friend who has the same table I use mine for art and I never use coasters, But you'd never know. There aren't any rings anywhere. The shelf was what really turned me onto buying this. I can work at the table and have my art supplies right there which is super convenient. At one point it started to wobble but I just tightened the screws and it hasn't wobbled again since. If you wanted to you could lay back and put your feet up on the table, put a cold drink down and after time it would still maintain its rustic beauty. It's been years and I am still super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Valintyne

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight coffee table. Looks good with the rest of our decor but it's not very sturdy - shakes side to side a little bit even after everything has been tightened. The metal legs are thin and not well rounded so be careful if you have kids. There are certain wood cutouts where the wood piece is still in there - if I take it out, there would be a random hole in the wood. Don't think that was intentional. Would return but too much of a hassle. Spend a bit more for higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nel J

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I buy this product. I bought the same table three years ago and I received a great item that I loved. Since I moved, I left the previous table for my friend and decided to buy a new one for myself. The table I received just does not have the same quality as before. One of the bottom boards is loose and it keeps popping up even when I tried hard to keep it down. I am disappointed and just do not have the time or energy to go through the return process including disassembly.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good little table
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little table. Only things that take away from it are that the screws on the edge pieces that frame the top are driven in pretty far so it looks like someone wasn't very good at managing a drill. Too the feet of the table do not conceal the screw at the bottom of the foot (holding the little plastic no scratch foot piece in place). These two things make something that potentially looks pretty cool look just okay. But I'm keeping them and they continue to grow on me. For the money, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Attractive piece, it only gets a 4 because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Attractive piece, it only gets a 4 because the undersurface of the wood pieces are not finished. I applied poly to the undersurface to seal the wood to prevent any warping due to moisture uptake in the humid Florida climate
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: wish I could give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, it's one of my favorite pieces. With the exception of the California Proposition 65 health warning. I inserted a web copy of the warning here because I lost the sticker that was placed on the the table. This warning caused me grief. However, after doing some research I decided to put it outside in my storage shed to "off gas" for a few days. There was no chemical smells coming from the table, otherwise I would have returned it. Putting on the lower shelf was a bit challenging, you need two people to do it since the table is very solid and heavy. BTW Amazon refuses to post my full review regarding the warning label. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Great table, only minor complaints
customer_reviews.text: Table looks great and was easy to assemble. Intructions weren't overly specific but I recommend putting the bottom shelf on first, then affix the legs to the top/top to the legs. I'm really happy I went with this option instead of a $300+ version Only 2 issues I have: 1) the screw holes are very visible and would benefit from hole plugs. It's easy to say this makes the table more rugged looking but I think it's an unnecessary oversight. 2) the underside of the wood is not finished which is not a big deal since you rarely see it but it's still a shortcut
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, larger coffee table for a casual living room. Brings in elements of industrial with the metal legs but could also work with cottage/beach type decor. For those that are sensitive, it does smell of wood stain at first. I also see the "ripples" that another poster mentioned, however mine are not as noticeable and my table has a darker appearance overall. Really does look like reclaimed wood and happy I purchased. Arrived earlier than expected and well packed. Assembly was easy. Took less than 10 minutes with one person. I attached legs loosely to the top section and then laid the table on its side. Added lower section next and finished by tightening up all the screws.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: There were mixed reviews so I was a little worried when I ordered the table. Turns out it is beautiful and looks like real reclaimed wood. It has a nice weight to it and was fairly easy to assemble, although a little tricky for one person. I attached the supports to the bottom shelf first (turning on it's side) and loosely tightening the screws, and then turned it upside down to attach the top. Then I went back to tighten the bottom shelf. After looking at other tables twice the price, this one looks expensive and has the style I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: LindaPBFL

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to put feet on & iron legs have SHARP edges
customer_reviews.text: Pretty coffee table. Looks much more expensive that the price. Looks great. My one problem: If you plan on putting your feet up on this coffee table while you watch TV, beware. The sharp edges make it VERY UNCOMFORTABLE. I have to put a pillow or quilt under my feet to be able to tolerate it. Just a warning. The manufacturer should round the top edges of the table. Found a second issue. Just discovered that the iron legs are also not rounded. They have sharp corners. I BROKE my toe on it. Warning: this attractive coffee table is dangerous & uncomfy for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great table but not reclaimed wood.
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful table for an incredible price. Especially since it offers the underneath storage. Easy to assemble (I did it by myself). Be sure to not tighten all the screws before you put the bottom piece in place as it will not fit if you do. For the price, size and the style you really cannot beat this deal. The ONLY reason it did not get 5 stars is I thought it was reclaimed wood but it comes with a tag stating it was manufactured to look like reclaimed wood.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price, but don't make it what it's not
customer_reviews.text: This has exceeded our expectations. Looks great, feels sturdy, and is larger than what I imagined. I was concerned about the other reviews saying it's wobbly and feels cheap, but after a careful assembly, I have no complaints. That being said, I did use a low profile screwdriver to help me tighten the bolts, and I would not trust the included allen wrench. I don't recommend depending on those for anything, really, including IKEA. Also, I would not sit on or place anything particularly heavy on this table. It's a fine coffee table, but not an heirloom piece.
customer_reviews.author: Laxoman

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this table. The wood looks different than in the picture. The pictures in the instructions are confusing, would have be better to just not use them. The hardware that came with the table is awful. The lock washers are very chinsy and the center of the regular washers are too wide so once you tighten down the bolt, the lock washers falls through the washer, defeating the purpose. The 4 stabilizing brackets are at the wrong angles, so it's difficult to get the holes lined up correctly. Very disappointed overall and would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ohiomane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and product
customer_reviews.text: Just received this awesome looking coffee table and gotta say for the price and ease of putting it together was awesome. Very nice looking and study and appears to be well made. Not too heavy and the legs have adjustable ends if you need too. I believe if you saw this same table in one of those big name furniture stores it would be double or more the price. Both top and bottom shelve is hard wood and appears to be pine thats fine. Also no smell from the stain and being packaged. It was also well packaged and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Peckham

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is large and beautiful. It was extremely easy to assemble, all the pieces were there, the screws and crank were packaged neatly and stapled to the underside of the coffee table top shelf. The wood is finished and has unique nail holes and imperfections that give it a very modern distressed touch. I think it looks great and homey! The only reason I took off a star is that while the topside of both of the surfaces is finished, the underside is definitely NOT. Beware of splinters.
customer_reviews.author: Hila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be the perfect coffee table for us- it was easy to assemble, looks great, great size, love the bottom shelf for storage. The top is not completely level, I like that (it was part of the appeal) but if you are looking for something sleek and completely level look elsewhere. The best part is that we get so many compliments on this piece, probably more than our other, much more expensive pieces from C&B or our true antiques! Haha. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Another outstanding purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this table! It is sturdy, assembled with no issues, and looks like a $600 table. I bought this on a whim, having looked in retail stores for a reclaimed wood table, only to be turned away by the ridiculously high price tags. I saw this on Amazon and decided to take a chance. I figured the worst that could happen was I'd lose $150. I held my breath when I opened the box (which came in perfect condition) and I absolutely loved what I saw. As soon as I finish this review I'm ordering the matching end tables. Amazon, how did I ever survive without you?
customer_reviews.author: Bldpmom

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS COFFEE TABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I can't actually believe how much I love this coffee table considering how inexpensive it was. It's absolutely gorgeous, is real wood, and is super sturdy. I could not be happier. It's exactly what I wanted. We also bought the sofa table to use as a TV stand. We bought the sofa table discounted as a damaged item from Amazon. When it came,one of the door hinges was broken. He had to do a bit of work on it to rebuild it and get it assembled, but it was worth it for the discount. We plan to also buy the end tables.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This table is pretty but it's not great
customer_reviews.text: This table is pretty but it's not great. You'll notice right away that the top isn't totally level - so you can't slide things across the table. This is fine (it's what I expected based on other reviews) but it's something that you have to get used to. The thing that really bothers me is that I've had this for 6 months now and it's incredibly wobbly. It is always moving side to side. I don't think it'll last very long. Update - It has been about a year and I already want to throw this away and get a new table. I can't stand the wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: MoFace

customer_reviews.title: Great little table!
customer_reviews.text: So happy that I decided to purchase this table. It has the Farmhouse look I was going for and is made out of real reclaimed wood. Its rather light so I can move it by myself if I decide to rearrange my living room. My cats LOVE the bottom shelf and seem to hang out with us more while we are watching tv because they have their own special place. For the money, if you like this style you can't go wrong. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Flower0813

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value, great look, real wood!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something rustic-ish looking and real wood, but didn't want to pay a crazy amount of money. I was pleased to find this product that not only checks those boxes, but exceeds my expectations! it is well made, i love that it is real wood and not some type of MDF or LDF. it looks much more expensive than it actually is and was incredibly easy to put together. I've had it for close to a year now and there have been absolutely 0 issues with it holding up, falling apart, or anything like that. it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Oats

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I didn't know what to expect but I am impressed with the set I purchased both the coffee table and two end tables To start, assembly is super easy If you have a power drill, it's even faster but we set one up by hand and one with a drill and it was still very simple Now, I absolutely love the style of these tables I love the slightly distressed appearance but still sturdy and modern-looking They match perfectly with the rug and I'm excited to see how the living room will look when it's complete Anyways, if you like this style, I would definitely recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Real value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Over the moon with this purchase! Not as heavy as I expected as the planks are relatively thin and while it may not feel as solid as a heavy oak piece, it's defintely sturdy and practical. Note this is not reclaimed wood, it's real wood made to look reclaimed but for the price you can't beat the look and quality! 100% recommend this product for anyone who is looking for a real wood, reasonably priced coffee tablel
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, more rustic than shown
customer_reviews.text: The table looks great! At first, I immediately fell in love with the texture (immediate splinters came about) and the color! The next day we had the chance to look closely into it, it’s definitely more rough/rustic than we expected. Top isn’t as smooth. If you notice in the pictures, after each four panels of wood, there’s a huge gap, as if the table is about to crack in literally two halves. I’ll keep an eye out for now before complaining. Not sure if it’s intentional orrrr wood defect.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged. Did not bother to take the rest ...
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged. Did not bother to take the rest out of the box. The box was all damaged and banged up. Also, there is a strong chemical smell to the table.
customer_reviews.author: SEBS

customer_reviews.title: It’s Heavy, looks super rustic Just Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love it! It was super easy to ensamble! No damage while delivered, looks so rustic loved the size wood color also I want to highlight the fact that the natural damage the actual wood comes with is what I love the most, I read someone giving a bad review because of that, I’m like dear that what makes it unique and GREAT! We def recommend this piece! Totally in Love! (Wife Voice)
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Adderlin Sencion

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this table isn't great but it's not terrible
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this table isn't great but it's not terrible. You can definitely tell it's not real wood. The stain has more of an orange tint to it, I had my boyfriend sand it down and re-stain it because I just couldn't get over how orange it looks. If you're looking for a rustic / industrial table for cheap, this is a good option- just don't have your standards too high as it's not very high end
customer_reviews.author: Christea

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews i got one an am i glad i did , i didn't have anything wrong with mine its absolutely awesome, it looks like they make them as there ordered because i used to wood work an its great craftsmanship, real wood !! If i had another place to put another one i would, simple yet well built, also it took about 4 minutes to put together an was well packaged, mine looked like it was dropped about 10 times an not a scratch on it great job to seller on how the pack them safely.
customer_reviews.author: Swedish/Irish /American

customer_reviews.title: Excellent look -- especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product for the money. I bought it to go with a much higher end leather sofa, fully intending for it to be a "placeholder." But it looks great, so it had become a keeper. My only gripe is that the exposed screw holes at the corners are not dyed as shown in the picture. I will be able to solve this with a q-tip and a bit of stain, but I wish it had been done already.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looks and quality for this price.  Believe all the good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: If these people made houses, I would buy one! I cannot believe the quality for the price. I was able to put this together by myself in about 15 minutes. It is very attractive and sturdy. A lot of fake rustic furniture has a terrible plastic look when you get up close but, this table looks really good and feels like something put together by craftsmen of a different era. Way better than some much more expensive pieces I've examined at furniture stores. Believe the good reviews on this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Libby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table exceeded my expectations. The wood is beautiful. It's very sturdy. Easy to clean with Method wood cleaner product. Really pretty finish darker than the picture but that's what I had hoped for when purchasing the coffee table. I'm so happy with it and my family loves it. My daughter likes it so much she said she's buying the same one when she moves out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshered

customer_reviews.title: Nice tables, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coffee table and one end table. They are very heavy, nice wood. I am for the most part pretty happy with them. I do have an issue with the different distress pattern. See pictures. The end table is quite different than the coffee table. Dark black lines much more prominent. The two don’t match. Not that big of a deal to me, I will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap table
customer_reviews.text: Awful. For one, the P65 warning is not listed in the description. The smell is so strong it got me light headed. I’m 6 weeks pregnant so that was a HUGE red flag. Secondly the bottom shelf is so cheap and flimsy. My husband and I have nice heavy coffee table books and once we put our books a top it dipped as if it were particle board. I should have listened to the bad reviews. People don’t write them for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: William Vasallo

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely gorgeous! It arrived early and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, wood is a bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVED this coffee table when I first got it - and I still do, but there's a few things you need to be aware of before you purchase. It's not made with high-quality hardwood. Yes, its made with real wood not particle board, (which just for that makes it a great buy for the price) but the wood they used dents and scratches extremely easily. For example, if you drop something hard like the corner of a TV remote on the table there will be a deep dent and it will expose the raw wood color without the stain. Otherwise, looks and works great, but I wonder how long it will last without getting dinged up.
customer_reviews.author: DaveyGravy

customer_reviews.title: Real wood super nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Real wood it is exactly what we were looking for easy to assemble nice and sturdy and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this coffee table for our metal-and-wood themed living room and for the price it's great. It isn't real reclaimed wood but looks just like the real thing. The table is easy to put together - better if you have two sets of hands, but if you're a furniture assembly ninja you can manage it on your own. The table feels very sturdy and the top can be easily wiped down despite the rough-ish texture. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Easily put together with just me
customer_reviews.text: Easily put together with just me. You do not need 2 people. Follow the instructions and you will be fine. Don't lock down the screws fully until you get the second piece situated in place. Hold the board with your leg and screw in each side. Then tighten all bolts. Easy! Solid wood. Great look. It does wobble just a little bit due to the legs only having to 2 screws on either side. Not noticeable unless you put your feet on it and starting moving your leg side to side. I am a fanatic about quality and this is a great piece and a great price point. Anything in this range would be compressed wood and veneer cover. Gross!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & sturdy table! I had the same issue as another person who said the screws, etc were not "contained" inside the box. They were loose and I had to spend some time making sure that everything was provided. I was missing one minor thing but was able to assemble it quite easily. I have gotten a lot of compliments on this table! UPDATE: I have now had this table for almost 4 yrs and I love it even more! I have a matching desk and both pieces look brand new. The coffee table has proven to be very durable. I will keep enjoying it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: ljnaka

customer_reviews.title: great looking table, but shoddy quality control
customer_reviews.text: bottom half was 2 1/2 inches longer than it should have been. Where's the quality control? I couldn't put on the second set of legs without leaving out the bottom half. #returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it's PERFECT! Not only does it fit well
customer_reviews.text: We recently downsized and bought all new furniture for our new home, including this coffee table. We were concerned that this table would be too big for our new space, but it's PERFECT! Not only does it fit well, but it goes great with our rustic farmhouse decor. The quality of this coffee table is beyond what we expected, the durability is too! The details in the wood and steel are just amazing! We gets TONS of compliments on our new table and now considering the purchase of the matching entry table! If you are looking for something stylish, unique, quality built with that "wow" factor, look no further, you have found it right here!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: This table is the best bang for your buck coffee table on the internet.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble, and looks great. The wood is cheap "reclaimed" wood, but is finished VERY nicely and looks great. The top is probably something you could build yourself with cheap wood, a sander, and some stain and poly. But for $91 dollars why waste your time. They did the work for you and did a great job. Thumbs WAAAAY UP.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, great value.
customer_reviews.text: The look of this table was perfect for my living room, and is half the price of similar tables I found. While the wood has a rustic, not-quite-distressed look to it, there is a clear finish over it which protects it nicely. Once minor assembly complaint: there were no pre-drilled holes for installing the lower shelf so I had to drill those, but even with doing that, assembly was only about 20 minutes. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Om Grown Music

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wooden table super easy to put together I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful wooden table super easy to put together I did this on my own! Once I take a picture I will add it. But I wanted to share before I completely forgot. This is worth every cent. This table is also listed from other vendors but is priced more, as always Amazon takes the cake!! I will mention this needs to be cleaned upon purchase it has a light smell not sure why maybe tinting? I used lavender oil to tone it down its perfectly fine now. Looks high end and its fancy smancy.
customer_reviews.author: Zeniah S

customer_reviews.title: Great looking coffee table for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table. It has that rustic look so the top isn't completely even. It is even enough for drinks etc, just you can feel it if you run your hand along it. It is a great size and height. Per my husband it is pretty straightforward to put together as well, he did so by himself in less than an hour. It is very sturdy and we will use it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this coffee table. The table was a bit lighter than I had planned but I just wiped a quick coat of all in one stain on it and the color is beautiful. (Picture is after stain was applied). Great quality and has the look of a high end coffee table. Already received many compliments.... definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: fvalentino

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee table!!
customer_reviews.text: Since the pandemic, I’ve been home a lot and being home had me thinking of ways to improve my living area. I’ve started adding furniture and needed a nice yet inexpensive coffee table. I had recently fell in love with this table on another website and decided to check to see if Amazon had it cheaper. To my surprise it was $20 less!! It was a bit of a struggle putting it together with just me. I think it would have been easier putting the bottom part together first but the end result was perfect. It’s my favorite piece in my living room!! Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Travonda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, sturdy beautiful wood, easy to assemble (instructions said 2 person but I did it by myself), looks great in our livingroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Took a week to arrive but well worth the wait! One of the metal pieces was not flush but I was able to hammer it down. It's much bigger than I anticipated but I love it! Looks way more expensive than it was. I was worried mine would be uneven on the top after reading some reviews but mine is smooth and flat. The side table is huge as well! It wobbles but I'm ok with that. It's very tall!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky girl

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table but the one downfall is that it came with a small chip along the edge. I assume it occurred during shipping. But it isn't a huge deal since the table has a rustic/worn look it works. We've decided t's not worth the hassle of returning and receiving a new one. Assembly was super easy. Really heavy duty, well made!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: As everyone else suggests its amazing how nice of a coffee table you get for the money you paid. Its super sturdy, it wipes clean easily. Water, oil, water goes on it, we wipe it of and its like new. We love the look and quality!! Thank you Emerald Home!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, perfect, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful and takes about 20 minutes to assemble, which just consists of attaching the legs and bottom shelf. To support the shelf, I leaned it against a step stool that was about the same height while I screwed in the bolts. It's sturdy and doesn't slip/slide around, but then again I have it on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: KarenW803

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble: Great Look
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that for something that only costs $150 or so and comes in a flat pack box could look so great. The table took maybe 10 mins from the box to fully assembled. The wood was flat, not warped, and has a great color. It even smells like it was freshly cut or something, and the material itself is very heavy. I would certainly buy this table again!
customer_reviews.author: joshua feazell

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Beautiful, Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Wow, we LOVE our table. It is so beautiful and slightly rustic, which matches our decor perfectly. It is solid as a rock, and I don't know how much it's supposed to support, but I've definitely sat on it and stood on top at times, and I weigh 130 lbs. That thing won't budge. It's seriously awesome - especially for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan and Josephine H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table weeks ago and i only had the chance to put it together last night! Very very easy to install. The screws fit well. The instructions could be better because i have a few more unused screws left. I only used 8 screws all together. Overall im very happy of this purchase. Item isn’t that heavy and requires 2 people to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: I. Baron

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous when I ordered this coffee table, that it wouldn't be high quality. However, I love to work with wood and all of my friends know that I like to make pieces by hand from real reclaimed wood. I ordered this coffee table and one of my friends asked if I made it, which is a compliment to the table... The piece looks like genuine reclaimed wood, was easy to put together (I stacked books between the layers to make it easier to screw on while upside down). The piece came together in less than 10 minutes & it's held up ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool + great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and vey cool looking. I also love that it looks heavy but is lightweight because our space so I move it often. Two complaints I have is the the wood slats have narrow spaces between them that need to be vacuumed cleaned. Second complaint it the top is already a little dinged and scratched even though we use coasters and have been gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already, you can always send it back!
customer_reviews.text: We spent a day going to four area furniture stores looking for a coffee table. We saw tons of tables in the $400-$500 range that we thought were ugly. We went home frustrated. Jumped on Amazon and found this Gem. It required a little assembly, but it looks great in our room and you can't beat the price! Also shipped fast by Amazon Prime. There is a good reason it was the number one selling coffee table on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Received broken and used table. See pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Was obviously purchased, assembled, disassembled, shipped back and then sold to me. Most likely in the same poor box. Allen wrench and nuts/bolts missing. A piece of the frame ripped off. I might have to buy another box just so UPS will accept it. Very surprised and disappointed. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Light Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Really, really uneven surface
customer_reviews.text: 3.8 stars. Ok, so this is a great table. Solid wood, looks great, perfect size. My only complaint is that one of the wood slates is significantly of a different height than the rest. Now, I expected an uneven surface, and even like that about this table overall. But, this one slate.... It's like, maybe 1/4 inch higher than the rest. That might not sound like a lot, but it is on a table; cups don't really balance, for example. Fortunately it's just the one slate that's so far off, so I turned the table around so I wouldn't be so annoyed with it.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the Money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this from Warehouse Deals and we LOVE it. Came a little nicked but added a little stain to spots which made it perfect. This sturdy table is just the right size, well made, rustic yet nice. You can't find used coffee tables this good for this price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was worried it would feel cheap but it looks expensive and is sturdy. We have a ton of kids over hanging out from ages 2-40 and we are a rough crowd - this coffee table hangs in there with us and we all love it. I recently purchased expensive custom furniture and this is the piece everyone compliments when they see my new living room!
customer_reviews.author: LEmerson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great size, looks like real solid wood
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this end table! It's actually light weight but looks like real solid wood. The best part to me, is how easy it was to assemble. Took about 10 minutes from opening the box to having it finished. The size of the table is perfect also. Most, I've noticed are too short or just way too small but this one is a great size for a large lamp and nice decorations. Love my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For the price point I am extremely pleased with this table. It's beautiful and was very easy to assemble. They even included extra hardware in case it was needed. I took some of the advice in the reviews and waited to tighten the screws until everything was in place.
customer_reviews.author: Maria W.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed for the price
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of cheap laminate/particleboard tables I vowed to only get real wood stuff that won't peel. I wasnt sure what to expect at this price, but I'm extremely impressed. It's sturdy, solid, and feels much more expensive than it is. The top isn't perfectly flat which is expected with this type of wood, but with coasters there's no problems with drinks wobbling. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Steven Leonhard

customer_reviews.title: It actually looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived this afternoon and just finished assembling. Im always very skeptical with online purchase especially furnitures but oh my god it actually looks really nice. It's quite weighty and feels very sturdy. Assembling wise, it took me 30-40 minutes to do it myself. It's basically not tricky as the screw combinations are all the same. Putting on the lower layer could be tough with just one person but apparently it is still doable. I would give it five star but want to wait and see if it actually lasts well.
customer_reviews.author: SL.Z

customer_reviews.title: Too much styrofoam packaging. Get rid of the styrofoam...unable to dispose of it ecologically
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness, the solid wood, ease of assembly...instructions said two people, but me being 70 years of age had no difficulty at all putting it together. It's great for placement in front of my 85" big wall TV and holding all audio/video boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R McCoppin

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am truly so happy with this purchase. I read reviews that said that it looks even better in person and I completely agree. The wood has a beautiful reclaimed look to it and I love that it is real wood. The ONLY reason I didn’t give five stars is that the place where the bottom shelf of the coffee table screws into the metal leg pieces was angled incorrectly on one side so I had to use a rubber mallet to correct it in order to install the lower shelf. But with that done the assembly was easy (my 3 year old installed a lot of the screws lol) and the final product exceeds my expectations. Very happy overall!
customer_reviews.author: whitb

customer_reviews.title: Table hardware/connections become loose and can’t tighten!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this table for 2 years. After only 1 year the legs became loose with normal use (it is a coffee table) and I am finally fed up enough from the wiggling to leave this review. The hardware could be much better quality (or maybe the hardware attachment design). This should not happen for a table at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Ness

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been watching the price for a while and finally pulled the trigger at a sweet discount. It was easily assembled by myself (don't tighten the screws until everything is in place). The wood is solid, heavy, and has a charming reclaimed look. Looks much more expensive than it is. There is a wood stain smell but it's not overwhelming and I'm sure it will fade. Won't mind putting my feet up on this table or setting up a spread of food and drink while watching TV!
customer_reviews.author: Suneimi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this coffee table!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful stylish coffee table that is perfect for my living room. Not extremely solid because it has metal legs, but still a great quality table. My husband is 270lbs and he puts a pillow on the coffee table and props his legs up, it wobbles just a little if he moves, but not much. The wood top is very pretty with those perfect slight imperfections needed to make it look a little rustic. I did put a coat of polyurethane on it to seal it well and to make it easier to clean. I am VERY happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S Brewer

customer_reviews.title: It is such a great find for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: This table far exceeded my expectations! It is such a great find for an awesome price! I love how it's not perfectly even on top Ian spots giving it that true reclaimed wood quality. Very sturdy and has a good weight to it, SUPER easy to build just legs really! So many complements on it already! If your thinking of getting it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lex616

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this table!!! It's so beautiful! I had looked at so many high end furniture stores for a rustic wood coffee table and just couldn't spend the money that they cost. I saw this and took a chance and I'm glad I did. Beautiful, rustic table that I have in my formal dining room. It adds so much character to the room. Took my husband 10 minutes to assemble so he loves it too. :) One of my favorite Amazon purchases. Also, fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMountainMama

customer_reviews.title: Great table, made of real wood.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Sturdy yet light enough to move around easily. Really like that it is real wood and not a veneer. Easy set up with just a screwdriver. Bought one for my son in college. Liked it so much I bought one for my brother when he moved to a new place. Liked it again so much that I got one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: robert k

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE QUALITY FOR THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: You’ll be impressed with the quality of this piece. Heavy and solid! I wanted it for my Coastal Inspired den in Florida. I sprayed the black frame and legs white then white-washed the distressed wood with chalk paint and applied polyurethane. This piece now looks 4 times more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: C Gray

customer_reviews.title: Faux distressed table with metal sides--nice design, poor materials
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not actual distressed wood, it's new wood/MDF made to look old/beat up. Stain is coming off near edges already just from little bumps here and there; doesn't "add" to the distressed look FYI, it just looks like it needs a touch-up instead. Metal sides/feet feel sturdy. Nice design overall, but wood is not high quality enough for long-term use as primary living room table.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The table came packed in messy Styrofoam, which stuck to everything. I think a different packing material should be considered. The table was easy to put together using the tool included. It looks great in our ranch-home living room. The wood is solid; however, there is a slight bow in the center of the table, which makes it not flat at all. The label states that it is made of "reclaimed, barn-like wood" so it is not actually reclaimed wood. Overall, I like the style and design of the table and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Goode Family

customer_reviews.title: It stinks so bad
customer_reviews.text: After more than one month this table still stinks of some chemical that they used to paint it with. As soon as it arrived it smelled so bad we that we had to stay away from the living room for a couple of weeks. The scary thing is that this table is made in China so there is no guarantee about the safety of the chemicals they used for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The table looks nice, that's why it gets three stars. HOWEVER it smells like major chemicals, and it's VERY strong. I'm hoping the stench goes away in the next couple of weeks. Also, the assembly directions are a picture only, no written instructions, and it was a lot of trial and error to get a relatively simple table assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood table at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a STEAL! Real wood and easy to assemble. Looks great in my living room. A little larger than I expected but in a good way. I want the side table but I'm confused why it is more expensive than the coffee table 🤔 If you are in doubt, get it! I am going for a southwest modern living room and the distressed finish and metal sides work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: A SaramaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Great pretend distressed reclaimed wood
customer_reviews.text: JUST ARRIVED. Took maybe 15 minutes to assemble. Put in all of the bolts and washers first a little LOOSE and then go around and tighten the whole thing up. *TIP when ready to do the lower shelf (and first make sure the the bolts are a little loose) - TURN the whole table on it's side makes it easier to handle the shelf. Looks great. Great pretend distressed reclaimed wood. It looks terrific. Worth the $100. Solid. Keeper. Good job to the guys who engineered the putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Boston MA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s gorgeous and real wood. Easy to assemble. When is installing the bottom shelf the screws go downwards FYI lol I learned the hard way. Really only ten minutes to assemble and one person. Definitely recommend. Perfect size for a studio.
customer_reviews.author: Epirocks1985

customer_reviews.title: Stay away. Nothing but junk.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing but junk. Honestly as the seller did you ever buy a sample and see how low the quality is on this? It’s a complete mess. Package was poor and the table it’s self was so warped it couldn’t even be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kmunshower

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rustic Table
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited that I Got my Coffee Table today! I live in an upstairs apartment so the UPS dude decided to leave it at the bottom of the stairs lol Thankfully I have a nice neighbor who helped me carry it up the stairs. I was able to put it together in under an hour. lol I had a little trouble putting the bottom shelf together but I made due with my knees helping me balance the shelf while I screwed it together. But other than that It was really simple and I did it by myself. (Pats self on back) it is a Beautiful table and I am totally satisfied and I would definitely recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is very quick and easy to assemble . However within two weeks of using, the bottom part of the coffee table has a huge crack in it. The only thing stored on it was a few throw blankets. Any small use of this coffee table results in little scratches all over the top. I did call customer service and the lady was very pleasant but the best they could do was give me a small percent of the cost back as I had already thrown out the box it came in so there was no way to return it. Save yourself some money and buy something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Jurasz

customer_reviews.title: Cute table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table is cute for the price. It was very easy to assemble and pretty light weight. It does sit a little bit lower than my old table (just something I didn’t think about). Clearly it isn’t the worlds best quality, but for the price, it’s pretty good. The only thing is that when I opened it, it had a very strong odor. The next morning I could still smell it. I’m not sure if it is some type of sanitizing thing they used or something with the “wood”. That’s the only “complaint” about the product.
customer_reviews.author: tori collick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and really sturdy. I like that it's real wood. Easy to put together as long as you don't screw the leg screws too tight at the start so you can slip the bottom piece in (did it by myself pretty easily). Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: EI

product_meta.title: Emerald Home Chandler Rustic Industrial Solid Wood and Steel Coffee Table with Open Shelf
product_meta.description: Size:48" Coffee Table| Color:Pine BrownThe wood and steel of the Chandler collection pair brilliantly with any style family or living room, instantly creating the look and feel of history in your space. The planked top highlight the wood’s natural knots and grain and will only look better with age. Solid steel angled legs and cross-bracing with metal rivets details provide an architectural look. Arrives in one box and assembles in minutes; easy to unpack, assemble with included tools and instructions, and set in place to enjoy. Makes clean up a snap with durable materials and finishes. Simply dust with a soft dry cloth and clean up spills when they happen.
feature_bullets: Rustic hardwood and industrial steel are a match made in heaven when combined to make Emerald Home’s Chandler coffee table.
Warm wood tones and dark steel patina create the look and feel of an old family heirloom.
Distressed, solid wood planked top and open shelf highlight the natural knots and grain.
Solid steel angled legs and cross-bracing with exposed metal fasteners and rivets provide an architectural look.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,718 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
